About

Having access to financial services anytime and anywhere creates opportunity, empowers people and businesses to engage in the global economy. Novum provides you with the most convenient payment services via all technologies. We are working everyday to simplify difficult and complex processes, making expensive services cheaper.
Novum erases boundaries, becoming the number one banking alternative.
